summary: Tested UI changes for back button visibility, header scroll effect, AQI widget headline, Education categories filtering, Digital Marketing course display, and payment dialog with scholarship option. All 8 tests passed.

issues: Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent (console warning for accessibility)

passed_tests: AQI Widget headline shows 'Air Quality (Pollution)' correctly
Header scroll effect works - gradient at top, changes to rgb(17, 24, 39) (gray-900) when scrolled >20px
Back button has visible white background (rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2)) with rounded style
Education page shows only enabled categories: Professional Job, Skill Development, Language, Tech
K-12 and College categories are properly hidden/disabled
Digital Marketing Mastery course displayed with ₹54,999 price
Pay & Enroll button opens payment dialog
Payment dialog shows QR Code placeholder with 'QR Code Coming Soon' text
Payment dialog has 'Apply for Scholarship' link that routes to /benefits page
critical_code_review_comments: Back button styling implemented correctly with bg-white/20 class for visibility
Header scroll effect uses proper React useState and useEffect with scroll listener
Education categories correctly filtered to only show enabled categories (professional, skill, language, tech)
Payment dialog properly implemented with QR placeholder and scholarship redirect link
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI changes verified working: 1) Back button has white/visible background (rgba 255,255,255,0.2), 2) Header changes from gradient to gray-900 (rgb 17,24,39) on scroll, 3) AQI widget shows 'Air Quality (Pollution)' headline, 4) Education only shows enabled categories, 5) Digital Marketing course shows ₹54,999, 6) Payment dialog has QR placeholder and scholarship link.

mocked_apis.qr_payment: QR code is placeholder - 'QR Code Coming Soon'

payment_dialog.qr_placeholder: Shows 'QR Code Coming Soon' with icon
